    • About Scott Gregory


    Scott Gregory is the lead agent on The Scott Gregory Team at eXp Realty, and has been a top producer in real estate sales along the Emerald Coast for the last two decades. Scott and his team specialize in residential sales and investment properties. When you buy or sell with Scott, you get a full team at your service. Scott also is a national real estate sales coach with Club Wealth real estate coaching. His team can help you buy or sell property anywhere in America. Referrals are always welcome. Interested in a career in real estate anywhere in America, or in opportunities with his team? Reach out to Scott.
